summary: Provides a suite of command‑line tools for the Flet framework, including commands to scaffold new projects, build native executables, package applications with PyInstaller, publish web bundles, run apps with hot‑reload, and manage reusable command‑line options. Each command parses its specific arguments, prepares the project environment, invokes the appropriate build or runtime processes, and handles post‑operation cleanup and reporting.
business_intent: Enable developers to efficiently create, develop, test, package, and distribute Flet applications from a single unified CLI, streamlining the full application lifecycle across desktop, web, and mobile targets.
